summary.do: Anything UX+UI, happy to run interviews and tests, design wireframes and mockups, or analyse user metrics. Also, glad to make use of what I know about programming if applicable!
summary.from: I was born and raised in Hong Kong, am part Swedish, and am based in both countries.
summary.language: English: Native, Swedish: Intermediate, Indonesian: Basic
summary.contact:
Feel free to contact me directly on linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/eve-l-620764203/

See my experience and more below!

section1.param0: UX/UI Design Intern at Cubicasa 2024-2025 Helsinki, Finland
section1.param1: Re-designed the in-house tool used by the CS team for unification & increased efficiency. From research to hi-fi design in close collaboration with CS team lead & product manager.*Designed landing pages and their content to inform and convert users; implemented on the company website. Balanced the goals and needs of the marketing team with the technical constraints of the development team through collaborative communication.*Analysed user data and developed wireframes to reduce first-time user churn, focused on improvements to the homepage content and first-timer user flow.*Created A/B tests on company website pages, which resulted in ~12-17% increase in conversion rate. Improved the testing process by setting up more targeted goal tracking.

section2.param0: Evaluation by Anastasia Corjan, Senior Marketing Manager
section2.param1: "Eve has successfully completed her UX/UI internship at CubiCasa, demonstrating exceptional creativity, problem-solving skills, and a strong understanding of user-centered design. Throughout her internship, she contributed to various projects, including improving the user experience of our employee facing web portal and customer facing mobile app. Her ability to conduct user research, analyze feedback, and translate insights into intuitive design solutions greatly enhanced the usability of CubiCasa."

section3.param0: Freelance Graphic Designer Western Union 2019-Now Hong Kong
section3.param1: Creation of marketing material such as posters, flyers, social media assets, shop-rebranding with fast-turnaround & iterations.*Alignment with brand visual guidelines & multilingual audiences.

section4.param0: 2nd Place Winner in Uppsala Sustainable Mobility Hackathon 2023
section4.param1: Teamed with five at a two-day InnoCenter Uppsala event (EU-supported) to develop a pitch promoting sustainable transport.

section13.param1: I enjoy photography, especially when travelling, art/digital illustration, badminton, hiking, and podcasts (like 'the next big idea' and 'no stupid questions')!</br></br>Also enjoy storytelling in general—from books to games, and am currently making a small game for fun.</br></br>Occasionally, a need arises that allows me to enjoy designing 3D printing solutions to those problems (except when in the middle of printing, you realise you've made an error...)
